content: pattern is also available in czech 1 thanks to petiii 2 this sweater is knit in one piece from the top down on two needles in a raglan style it s an easy sweater for a beginner with only two seams one down each arm **january 8 2022** pattern update adds metric units and a choice of font verdana or times new roman comments by missvick i ve made this pattern twice the first time with the blue sky alpaca organic cotton yummy two very different yarns two different gauges but it doesn t really matter since its for a baby this time i used two colors blue for the body and green along the edges and button band it looked great both were gifts and the mothers-to-be were very pleased 1 http //petra-plete blogspot cz/2013/02/navod-na-kabatek-pro-miminko html 2 http //www ravelry com/people/petiii
